user.title: Heater Configuration
user.description: Configure the EMS-ESP entities for boiler control.

data_description.heater_entity: Number entity to control boiler flow temperature setpoint
data_description.flow_temp_entity: Sensor showing current boiler flow temperature
data_description.return_temp_entity: Sensor showing current boiler return temperature
data_description.outdoor_temp_entity: Sensor showing outdoor temperature for compensation
data_description.solar_power_entity: Sensor showing current solar power generation (for limiting)

global.title: Global Settings
global.description: Configure temperature limits and efficiency settings.

data_description.min_egress: Lowest flow temperature when minimal heating is needed
data_description.max_egress: Highest flow temperature for maximum demand
data_description.min_ignition_level: Demand percentage below which heater stays off
data_description.solar_threshold: Solar power level above which heating is reduced
data_description.solar_drop: Temperature reduction when solar threshold is exceeded

data_description.zone_name: Unique name for this heating zone
data_description.zone_valve_entity: Switch or climate entity controlling zone valve
data_description.zone_default_setpoint: Default target temperature when no schedule active
data_description.kp: How aggressively to respond to temperature error
data_description.ki: How much to compensate for accumulated error
data_description.kd: How much to dampen rapid temperature changes
data_description.ke: How much to boost output when cold outside
data_description.add_another: Check to add another zone after this one

error.invalid_temp_range: Maximum temperature must be greater than minimum
